title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4604.4 - Procedure when application is approved
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4604.4 - Procedure when application is approved

State Regulations

When the municipal governing body approves of an
amendment to a license, it may amend the original license by attaching thereto
a duly authenticated rider bearing the seal of the municipality, if available, or on the official letterhead of such licensing authority. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4604.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
